alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 3:25PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Beaver County through 345 PM MDT... At 324 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles west of Milford, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Beaver County. This includes Utah Route 21 between mile markers 59 and 62, and between mile markers 64 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
